mapper.insert: insert into app_query_record (id, serialNo, productType, parameter, userId, created_at, updated_at, create_user, update_user, version, response) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{producttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{response,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update app_query_record set serialNo = #{serialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, productType = #{producttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parameter = #{parameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, response = #{response,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, serialNo, productType, parameter, userId, created_at, updated_at, create_user, update_user, version, response from app_query_record
mapper.sql: q.id id, q.serialNo serialNo, q.productType productType, q.parameter parameter, q.response response, q.userId userId, q.created_at createdAt, q.updated_at updatedAt, q.createUser createUser, q.updateUser updateUser, q.version version
